content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":145181,"originalJapaneseLine":"　多少の不安なぞ払拭出来る","translatedEnglishLine":"I can dispel some worries."},{"lineNumber":145182,"originalJapaneseLine":"もしも、死んだのが魔人四天王の一角","translatedEnglishLine":"If it had been one of the Four Heavenly Kings of the Demons who died,"},{"lineNumber":145183,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクであったなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"if it had been Kessel Link,"},{"lineNumber":145184,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのときの軍のダメージは想像したくもなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"I didn't even want to imagine the damage to the army at that time."},{"lineNumber":145185,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、気に食わんがケッセルリンクは強い。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, I don't like it, but Kessel Link is strong."},{"lineNumber":145186,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バボラと違い人間に殺されはせんだろうがな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Unlike Babora, he probably wouldn't be killed by a human.\""},{"lineNumber":145187,"originalJapaneseLine":"「た、大変です！　ルメイ様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-It's terrible! Lord Lumey!\""},{"lineNumber":145188,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、騒々しい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is it, so noisy!\""},{"lineNumber":145189,"originalJapaneseLine":"思わず椅子から立ち上がり叱責するが、","translatedEnglishLine":"He stood up from his chair and reprimanded them without thinking,"},{"lineNumber":145190,"originalJapaneseLine":"部下は微塵も堪える様子はない。","translatedEnglishLine":"but his subordinates showed no sign of being affected at all."},{"lineNumber":145191,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、それが、その……あの……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-That is, well... um...\""},{"lineNumber":145192,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケッセルリンク様が……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Kessel Link has..."},{"lineNumber":145193,"originalJapaneseLine":"　討たれました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"been defeated...\""},{"lineNumber":145194,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、と……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What did you say...?\""},{"lineNumber":145195,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケッセルリンクが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kessel Link..."},{"lineNumber":145196,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間に討たれた、と……言うのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"was defeated by a human... you say?\""},{"lineNumber":145197,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい……その通り、です……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes... that's correct...\""},

{"lineNumber":145198,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿な……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Impossible...\""},

{"lineNumber":145199,"originalJapaneseLine":"足から力が抜け、ルメイは気づけば","translatedEnglishLine":"His legs gave out, and before he realized it, Lumey had"},{"lineNumber":145200,"originalJapaneseLine":"椅子に深く座り直していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"sat deeply back in his chair."},

{"lineNumber":145201,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬお、おおお、おおおおおおおお……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nuo, ooooh, oooooooooh...\""},

{"lineNumber":145202,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんなこと……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Such a thing...\""},

{"lineNumber":145203,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリス様になんと報告すれば良いのだ……","translatedEnglishLine":"How am I supposed to report this to Lord Cave Bliss...?"},

{"lineNumber":145204,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの……それで……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, well... so...\""},

{"lineNumber":145205,"originalJapaneseLine":"　前線はどこもひどい混乱で……","translatedEnglishLine":"The front lines are in severe chaos everywhere..."},

{"lineNumber":145206,"originalJapaneseLine":"　脱走兵が後を絶たず……","translatedEnglishLine":"Deserters are relentless..."},

{"lineNumber":145207,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やかましい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Silence!"},

{"lineNumber":145208,"originalJapaneseLine":"　予備兵力をいくらでもつぎ込んで","translatedEnglishLine":"Throw in as many reserve forces as needed,"},

{"lineNumber":145209,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんとか立て直せ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and somehow restore order!\""},

{"lineNumber":145210,"originalJapaneseLine":"「十万、二十万、いくらでもだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hundred thousand, two hundred thousand, whatever it takes!\""},

{"lineNumber":145211,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はぃぃぃぃっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes, sir!\""},

{"lineNumber":145212,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……くそっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Damn it!\""},

{"lineNumber":145213,"originalJapaneseLine":"これからの軍の立て直しに","translatedEnglishLine":"Thinking about the effort it will take to rebuild the army from now on,"},

{"lineNumber":145214,"originalJapaneseLine":"かかる労力に思いを馳せ、ルメイは頭を抱えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lumey held his head in his hands."},

{"lineNumber":145215,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマンの西部に、","translatedEnglishLine":"In the western part of Helman,"},

{"lineNumber":145216,"originalJapaneseLine":"月の光すら届かない、鬱蒼と生い茂る、","translatedEnglishLine":"there was a dense, lush forest where even moonlight could not reach,"},

{"lineNumber":145217,"originalJapaneseLine":"深く、暗い森があった。","translatedEnglishLine":"a deep, dark forest."},

{"lineNumber":145218,"originalJapaneseLine":"トランシルバニアの森――","translatedEnglishLine":"The Transylvania Forest—"},

{"lineNumber":145219,"originalJapaneseLine":"そう呼ばれ近隣住民も近づかないこの森には","translatedEnglishLine":"Called that, this forest where even nearby residents do not approach,"},

{"lineNumber":145220,"originalJapaneseLine":"到底似合わぬ居城があった。","translatedEnglishLine":"there was a castle completely out of place."},

{"lineNumber":145221,"originalJapaneseLine":"ブラン城――","translatedEnglishLine":"Bran Castle—"},

{"lineNumber":145222,"originalJapaneseLine":"何年前からそこにあるかも不明の、","translatedEnglishLine":"an old castle whose origins have been unknown for years,"},

{"lineNumber":145223,"originalJapaneseLine":"人住まぬ古城。","translatedEnglishLine":"an uninhabited ancient castle."},

{"lineNumber":145224,"originalJapaneseLine":"その城に魔人四天王の一人、","translatedEnglishLine":"In that castle was one of the Four Heavenly Kings of the Demons,"},

{"lineNumber":145225,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクがいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kessel Link."},

{"lineNumber":145226,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケッセルリンク様、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Kessel Link,"},

{"lineNumber":145227,"originalJapaneseLine":"　『今朝』の紅茶は如何ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"how do you find this morning's tea?\""},

{"lineNumber":145228,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、美味しいよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, it's delicious."},

{"lineNumber":145229,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これはカモミールか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is this chamomile...?"},

{"lineNumber":145230,"originalJapaneseLine":"「カモミールには神経を鎮める力があります。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Chamomile has the power to calm the nerves."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多少の不安なぞ払拭出来る
もしも、死んだのが魔人四天王の一角
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it had been one of the Four Heavenly Kings of the Demons who died,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクであったなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if it had been Kessel Link,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのときの軍のダメージは想像したくもなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't even want to imagine the damage to the army at that time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、気に食わんがケッセルリンクは強い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I don't like it, but Kessel Link is strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラと違い人間に殺されはせんだろうがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unlike Babora, he probably wouldn't be killed by a human."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「た、大変です！　ルメイ様！」
「なんだ、騒々しい！」
思わず椅子から立ち上がり叱責するが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He stood up from his chair and reprimanded them without thinking,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下は微塵も堪える様子はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but his subordinates showed no sign of being affected at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、それが、その……あの……」
「ケッセルリンク様が……
討たれました……」
「なんだ、と……？」
「ケッセルリンクが……
人間に討たれた、と……言うのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was defeated by a human... you say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい……その通り、です……」
「馬鹿な……
足から力が抜け、ルメイは気づけば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His legs gave out, and before he realized it, Lumey had

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 椅子に深く座り直していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sat deeply back in his chair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬお、おおお、おおおおおおおお……
「こんなこと……
ケイブリス様になんと報告すれば良いのだ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How am I supposed to report this to Lord Cave Bliss...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あの……それで……
前線はどこもひどい混乱で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The front lines are in severe chaos everywhere...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 脱走兵が後を絶たず……
「やかましい！
予備兵力をいくらでもつぎ込んで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Throw in as many reserve forces as needed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか立て直せ！」
「十万、二十万、いくらでもだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hundred thousand, two hundred thousand, whatever it takes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はぃぃぃぃっ！」
これからの軍の立て直しに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thinking about the effort it will take to rebuild the army from now on,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かかる労力に思いを馳せ、ルメイは頭を抱えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lumey held his head in his hands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの西部に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the western part of Helman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 月の光すら届かない、鬱蒼と生い茂る、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was a dense, lush forest where even moonlight could not reach,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深く、暗い森があった。
トランシルバニアの森――
そう呼ばれ近隣住民も近づかないこの森には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Called that, this forest where even nearby residents do not approach,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 到底似合わぬ居城があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was a castle completely out of place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブラン城――
何年前からそこにあるかも不明の、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an old castle whose origins have been unknown for years,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人住まぬ古城。
その城に魔人四天王の一人、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In that castle was one of the Four Heavenly Kings of the Demons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクがいた。
「ケッセルリンク様、
『今朝』の紅茶は如何ですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: how do you find this morning's tea?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、美味しいよ。
これはカモミールか……」
「カモミールには神経を鎮める力があります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Chamomile has the power to calm the nerves.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:
